about_the_game:
Game highlights:

  • Immersive hack’n’slash experience,

  • Solo and multiplayer setting (up to 4 players),

  • Various game modes (Story, Training, Mission),

  • Environmental storytelling,

  • An extraordinary story that doesn’t take itself too seriously,

  • Pixel-art graphics and breathtaking scenery,

  • Three open worlds, each with a unique environment and peculiar inhabitants,

  • Five whimsical protagonists, each with their own story, each driven by particular motivations,

  • Hundreds of secrets, puzzles, and new areas to discover.

CORRUPTED MINDS

Shadows are not alone! Dark creatures have taken over the bodies of the

inhabitants on infected planets. Since these beings have lost their minds, they have

also lost their reason and are no longer able to distinguish between what’s good

and what’s evil. The only thing driving them now is the urge to fight whatever

appears on their way.

IN THE MIDSTS OF DARK REALITY...

It is not easy to travel through those unfamiliar lands. The environment of affected

worlds has been mutilated by evil, and the darkness reaches much deeper than

one can imagine. The once breathtaking nature is dying, and no soul around

harbours good intentions toward you.

THEY NEED A HERO!

Being a hero is not so simple. It requires far more than most are able to give. Will a

team consisting of a self-centred switch, a kid who doesn’t give a damn, a

shamaness pursued by duty, a too-naive dwarf rider, and a necromancer who no

Does longer control his own fate suffice for this mission?

SHOW THEM WHAT YOU ARE MADE OF!

While rushing to save the planets, strength is the minimum requirement —

proficiency in using your abilities is more than crucial. It might mean nothing if

wielded unskillfully. Be cunning and constantly seek new ways to apply familiar moves.

Fight, combine, discover, or simply push ahead, turning the world around you into dust and rubble!

How you play is your choice — play your own way!

name: Warlocks vs Shadows 2 - Be a hero!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7470, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 or AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710, 1 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The Strongest, the Warlocks, the Heroes — those were the individuals now praised in ballads for aeons to come. They were the ones who challenged the Shadows, creatures that tried to devour the serenity of countless prospering worlds. Now, these creatures are pursuing to regain their entire might...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
